body:
GCC less than 8.3.0 cannot build OpenBLAS 0.3.12 due to this:
* https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/issues/2949

This PR makes this conflict explicit.

Resolves https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/19932

@siko1056 @scottwittenburg @t-karatsu
title: openblas@0.3.12 conflicts with gcc less than 8.3.0
